reviews.review_msg: An amazing professor. Expectations are clear, his marking  sticks to them, if you follow his instructions for exam prep and the paper, you're set. He's super knowledgeable, fair in his marking, lectures are well prepared, and the slides are posted online. Expect a presentation, midterm, final, and 4000 word paper, and very reasonable readings.

Greg Clarke provides no marks until student views final grade on internet. He is arrogant, condescending and views students as competition, rather than contribution.  Not a course for high order thinkers.  Stuck on the small stuff.  A discouraging and limited learning experience.  Not recommended.
